titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to remove a limitation on an individual's eligibility for medical assistance under the State Medicaid plan while the individual is in custody pending disposition of charges.
Equity in Pretrial Medicaid Coverage Act
Equity in Pretrial Medicaid Coverage Act
Equity in Pretrial Medicaid Coverage Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Equity in Pretrial Medicaid Coverage Act
This bill allows an otherwise eligible individual who is in custody pending disposition of charges (i.e., pretrial detainees) to receive Medicaid benefits.
